root.name: Soldier of Light
root.description: Originally release in Japan asÂ Xain'd Sleena in 1986, Solder of Light has the bounty hunter Xain fighting an evil alien force across a number of worlds.GameplayIn Soldier of Light, the player must take Xain through five worlds each with their own distinct theme and geography. Along the way, Xain can pick up new weaponsEach world ends with a boss fight, after which Xain plants a bomb and escapes to his ship. At this point, the game becomes a side-scrolling shooter as you make your way through waves of alien ships, before selecting your next world.After three worlds have been successfully completed, the player must fight a giant mother-ship.
